name: Ghost Story
description:
>> Ghost Story <<

A Visual Novel about Existential Horror


Some door had opened.
Thoughts that do no go away and cannot be thought away anymore.
Something had changed forever.

We are hunted.

>> A short and eerie Twine novel, inspired by my own existential angst.

>> With sound and images

>> Content may be disturbing to some audiences, so proceed with caution.

NEW UPDATE: I got the feedback, that the sound does not work for everyone, so if you don't hear sound right away (sound should start at the very first page) I recommend the download version.

UPDATE: A online version is now available. Just play it in the window above (Fullscreen is strongly recommended). However, the sound files take a time to load, so wait a moment before you begin the game. For those with a slow internet connection I would recommend the download version. (Install instructions below)
